newsitem.title: LATVIA: Estonia Tallinna Pank to buy into Latvian Saules.
newsitem.headline: Estonia Tallinna Pank to buy into Latvian Saules.

text.p: One of Estonia's leading banks, Tallinna Pank, is to buy 20 percent of 10th largest Latvian bank, Saules Bank, newspaper Bizness I Baltiya said on Monday.
It said that Saules held an extraordinary shareholders' meeting on Saturday, where they backed the sale to Tallinna Pank of the 20 percent stake for 900,000 lats.
Saules Bank was not available to confirm the report.

Tallinna Pank has been expected for some time to expand into the Latvian market, following in the footsteps of the largest Estonian bank, Hansapank. Hansapank earlier this year bought Latvian bank, Deutsche-Lettische.
